Text:
I cant thank you enough for this !
I had the COMIC BOOK WHORE album back in the day... And always wondered why she never became a smash hit ... That album was superb!

Big THANK YOU!!!!

=)

I have the album. and she apparently did some new stuff in the recent years. I've had a hard time getting copies.   This was released as a promo in 1997.  I always thought it was a great remix single.  Your very welcome.  I thought about posting the album some time in the future.
